entry.title: The Co-Optional Podcast Ep. 26 - Polaris
entry.content:
Watch more on PolarisGo: http://bit.ly/1hsCJCk http://bit.ly/1bJC4Ko Subscribe: http://bit.ly/PolarisSubscribe See what's next on Maker.TV ► http://mker.tv/Polaris TotalBiscuit, Dodger and Jesse Cox talk this week on The Co-Optional Podcast!
No Borderlands 3: http://bit.ly/M7HyCl Titanfall: http://bit.ly/1jM7SAM Back to The Future shoes: http://ti.me/1gcP1cQ
We'd like to thank Quill18 for letting us use his Banished footage. Be sure to check out his channel for more!
Quill18: http://www.youtube.com/user/quill18
---------
The Daily Byte: http://bit.ly/1h1qyci Lore! http://bit.ly/nNfsws Who is Polaris? http://bit.ly/14Z6vUP
---------
Totalbiscuit: http://www.youtube.com/user/TotalHalibut https://twitter.com/TotalBiscuit
Jesse Cox: http://www.youtube.com/user/OMFGcata https://twitter.com/JesseCox
Dodger: http://www.youtube.com/user/PressHeartToContinue https://twitter.com/Dexbonus
--------- JOIN POLARIS: http://bit.ly/17MTzDW POLARISGO: http://bit.ly/1ec7Hu6
Twitter: http://bit.ly/12ecJOw Facebook: http://on.fb.me/12Ue00n Google+: http://bit.ly/16l2toB Instagram: http://bit.ly/1aiOYgZ Tumblr: http://bit.ly/13HgrW4
Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound and Audio Micro ---------
Thanks for watching The Co-Optional Podcast!
The views and opinions expressed on this program are those of the persons appearing on the program and do not necessarily reflect the views and opinions of Maker Studios.
